prompts: Create a rock-type Pokemon with a volcanic theme and fiery accents.
I want a Pokemon that resembles a mountain with glowing lava spots.
Generate a unique creature that embodies both fire and rock elements.
Make a Pokemon with a rugged exterior and an explosive personality.
Imagine a Pokemon that thrives in volcanic regions and has a fiery temperament.
Design a creature that combines the power of magma and rocky terrain.
Show me a Pokemon that can unleash volcanic eruptions in battle.

distinctive_features: Flickering flames emanating from the top
